class.name: ch.algotrader.entity.property.PropertyHolderImpl
class.meta: Base class of an Entity that can hold {@link Property Properties}.

map.name: props
map.meta: Base class of an Entity that can hold {@link Property Properties}.

union-subclass.name: ch.algotrader.entity.PositionImpl

property.name: quantity
property.meta: The current quantity of this Position.

property.name: cost
property.meta: the cost associated with the current holdings of this Position. Based on the average cost method.

property.name: realizedPL
property.meta: the realized Profit-and-Loss of this Position

property.name: exitValue
property.meta: The price at which the Position will be closed. If an exitValue is defined, the Position will be closed using the defined default {@link ch.algotrader.entity.trade.OrderPreference DefaultOrderPreference}. A Position is closed by the AlgoTrader Server, therefore a corresponding Strategy does not have to be running.

property.name: maintenanceMargin
property.meta: The current margin needed by this Position.

property.name: persistent
property.meta: If set to {@code false}, the Position will be removed when resetting the database before a simulation run.

many-to-one.name: strategy
many-to-one.meta: Represents a running Strategy within the system. In addition the AlgoTrader Server is also represented by an instance of this class.

many-to-one.name: security
many-to-one.meta: The base class of all Securities in the system

property.name: feedType
property.meta: The market data feed that this Subscription is valid for.

property.name: persistent
property.meta: A {@code persistent} Subscription will always be delivered to the strategy (i.e. for S&P500). A {@code non-persistent} Subscription requested by a strategy for a specific duration of time (i.e. Options on S&P500). When resetting the database before a simulation run, these Subscriptions will be removed

set.name: allocations
set.meta: Contains certain order default values (e.g. quantity, orderType, delays, etc.). Except for the {@link ch.algotrader.enumeration.OrderType OrderType}, all values have to be defined through Properties.

many-to-one.name: defaultAccount
many-to-one.meta: Represents an actual Account / AccountGroup / AllocationProfile with an external Broker / Bank
